quotes.quote: Art is a jealous mistress, and if a man have a genius for painting, poetry, music, architecture, or philosophy, he makes a bad husband and an ill provider.
Sometimes the character of the mistress is inferred from the dress of her maids.
Next to the pleasure of finding a new mistress is that of being rid of an old one.
A wife who discomforts you with truth is better than a mistress who massages you with lies.
A sailor's love for the sea is only matched by his mistress's salty kiss.
The man that thinks he loves his mistress for her own sake is mightily mistaken.
Mistress: Something between a mister and a mattress.
A lover's soul lives in the body of his mistress.
A mistress never is nor can be a friend. While you agree, you are lovers; and when it is over, anything but friends.
A mistress should be like a little country retreat near the town, not to dwell in constantly, but only for a night and away.
The more one loves a mistress, the more one is ready to hate her.
A whore may be naked, but a mistress is nude. We are talking class.
Such mistress, such Nan,Such master, such man.
A lover always thinks of his mistress first and himself second; with a husband it runs the other way.
A man who marries his mistress leaves a vacancy in that position.
Even a faithful mistress can be bent by constant threats.
Men will bear many things from a kept mistress, which they would not bear from a wife.
